name: BLOONS
description:
BLOONS is an exciting puzzle game
based on the simple fact that popping
balloons is fun. Pop your way through
dozens of puzzling levels in this
exciting puzzle adventure. Each level
will have a different arrangement of
balloons, try and pop as many as you
can with the darts you are given. Look
out for special balloons, blocks and
darts, and have fun discovering what
they do. Bloons is a great game that
you can pick up and play for a few
minutes while you’re queued up at the
shops, or you can sit on the settee for
hours as you work your way through
the 70 levels included in the game.
And as an added bonus, we’ve
included a level editor where you can
create your own balloon puzzles!
